overall_conclusion: The provided text does not explicitly mention specific LRRK2 gene variants with defined protein changes (e.g., reference/alternate amino acids and positions). While the paper discusses pathogenic mutations and their effects on kinase activity and cellular phenotypes (e.g., inclusion body formation, cell death), no concrete variant-level functional evidence is reported. The ACMG functional evidence evaluation flowchart cannot be applied to individual variants without explicit variant identification and experimental data.
